function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide personal protective equipment, and adhere to public health guidelines for data collection activities.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing measures to promote good hygiene practices and proper ventilation within the houses.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement social distancing measures, improve ventilation, and promote good hygiene practices","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, usage of antimicrobial materials, and implementation of cleaning schedules","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, promoting vaccination, and reducing unnecessary movement between households","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures, increasing ventilation, and regular cleaning and disinfection of living room surfaces.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing hygiene protocols, promoting handwashing, and using antimicrobial surfaces in the kitchen.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhancing ventilation, promoting personal hygiene practices, providing hand hygiene stations in the bathrooms.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encourage the use of energy-efficient appliances or implement cooling systems to offset the heat generated.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Install occupancy sensors to automatically turn off lights in unoccupied rooms, and educate occupants on the importance of ventilation and air circulation.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement energy conservation initiatives, promote sustainable practices, and introduce energy pricing reforms to discourage wasteful usage.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage ventilation and air circulation, and promote regular cleaning and disinfection of tv sets and the surrounding areas.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote regular cleaning and disinfection of personal computers and encourage hand hygiene after use.","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use vacuum cleaners with hepa filters, schedule cleaning when occupants are out, and promote thorough ventilation after cleaning.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement regular cleaning and maintenance of washing machines and dryers, encourage proper hand hygiene, and educate occupants on the importance of hygienic laundry practices.","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensure proper ventilation in kitchen areas with gas ovens, conduct regular maintenance of oven exhaust systems, and educate occupants on indoor air quality and ventilation best practices.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of a/c systems, proper ventilation, and use of air purifiers","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Installation of smart hvac systems with weather-responsive controls, use of dehumidifiers","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education on energy-efficient a/c usage, installation of energy-efficient a/c units","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Educating occupants on energy-efficient thermostat settings and implementing automated systems for energy management","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing occupancy sensors to control lighting and educating occupants on energy-saving practices","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting surveys to understand cultural energy consumption patterns and implementing customized solutions","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collect and use accurate data on the local population’s lifestyle and energy consumption habits","category":"Monitoring and control of indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement occupancy-based lighting control systems, educate occupants on energy conservation","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging occupants to set the a/c thermostat to 24 8c, within the comfort level","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informative and effective advertising campaigns, increase in electricity rates, promoting occupancy-sensed lighting and occupancy sensing setback thermostat","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation and filtration systems, implementing regular maintenance practices, and monitoring air quality.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improvement of urban infrastructure, access to clean water, waste management, and better housing conditions.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community engagement and outreach programs to involve local residents in disease control efforts and policy emphasizing the link between health and sustainable development.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Raise awareness about health care costs of urban sprawl, improve mobility and urban density along public transit lines","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve surveillance and control measures, understand disease transmission patterns, provide physical addresses for low-income populations","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in improving water storage, sanitation, drainage, and housing, raise awareness about effective control measures for vector-borne diseases","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Addressing underlying urban poverty and improving living conditions","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing indicators and targets that emphasize health as a precondition and outcome of policies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving basic infrastructure for disease control and
